title: Sketch from Derivative Info
description: Interactive simulation where students construct function graphs given only derivative information, developing the ability to translate algebraic conditions about increasing/decreasing behavior, critical points, and concavity into visual curve representations.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Calculus
Derivatives
Curve Sketching
Critical Points
Concavity
Graph Analysis
prerequisites: Understanding of first and second derivatives
Understanding of concavity and inflection points

controls.description: Click and drag on the graph area to sketch a curve

controls.label: Clear
controls.description: Erase the current sketch and start over

controls.label: Check
controls.description: Evaluate which conditions the sketch satisfies

controls.label: Hint
controls.description: Show the next visual hint (points, tangents, arrows)

controls.label: Solution
controls.description: Toggle display of one valid solution curve
